org.jboss.windup.graph.service

Interface Service<FRAMETYPE extends com.tinkerpop.frames.VertexFrame>

  • Type Parameters:
    FRAMETYPE -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationReportIndexService, ApplicationReportService, ArchiveService, ClassificationService, DoctypeMetaService, EnvironmentReferenceService, FileModelService, GraphService, HibernateConfigurationFileService, HibernateEntityService, HibernateMappingFileService, InlineHintService, JarManifestService, JavaClassService, JavaMethodService, JavaParameterService, MavenModelService, NamespaceService, ProjectModelService, ReportService, RuleProviderExecutionStatisticsService, SourceReportModelService, SpringBeanService, SpringConfigurationFileService, TechnologyTagService, TypeReferenceService, WebXmlService, WindupConfigurationService, WindupJavaConfigurationService, XmlFileService, XsltTransformationService

    public interface Service<FRAMETYPE extends com.tinkerpop.frames.VertexFrame>
    Base service interface for interacting with WindupVertexFrame instances.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FRAMETYPE addTypeToModel(WindupVertexFrame model)
      Adds the type of this service to the provided WindupVertexFrame, and returns the result
      void commit()
      Commit any started transaction.
      long count(Iterable<?> obj)
      Count the number of WindupVertexFrame instances of the type for which this Service operates.
      FRAMETYPE create()
      Create a new instance of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates.
      FRAMETYPE createInMemory()
      Create a new VertexFrame of the Service's type, but don't attach it to the graph.
      Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAll()
      Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates.
      Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByProperties(String[] keys, String[] vals)
      Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the given properties.
      Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByProperty(String key, Object value)
      Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the given property.
      Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByPropertyMatchingRegex(String key, String... regex)
      Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the specified property matching the given regexes.
      FRAMETYPE getById(Object id)
      Get the instance of the type on which this Service operates that has the given id value.
      Class<FRAMETYPE> getType()
      Get the WindupVertexFrame type for which this Service operates.
      FRAMETYPE getUnique()
      Get a unique instance of the type on which this Service operates.
      FRAMETYPE getUniqueByProperty(String property, Object value)
      Search the graph for a model of the appropriate type with the given property name and value.
      com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.TitanTransaction newTransaction()
      Begin a transaction.
      void remove(FRAMETYPE model)
      Remove the given WindupVertexFrame instance from the graph.

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commit any started transaction.
        See Also:
        newTransaction()

      • count

        long count(Iterable<?> obj)
        Count the number of WindupVertexFrame instances of the type for which this Service operates.

      • createInMemory

        FRAMETYPE createInMemory()
        Create a new VertexFrame of the Service's type, but don't attach it to the graph. Note that only @Property annotated methods are supported by the returned object.

      • create

        FRAMETYPE create()
        Create a new instance of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates. The returned instance will already be persisted in the graph.

      • addTypeToModel

        FRAMETYPE addTypeToModel(WindupVertexFrame model)
        Adds the type of this service to the provided WindupVertexFrame, and returns the result

      • remove

        void remove(FRAMETYPE model)
        Remove the given WindupVertexFrame instance from the graph.

      • findAll

        Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAll()
        Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates.

      • findAllByProperties

        Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByProperties(String[] keys,
                                      String[] vals)
        Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the given properties.

      • findAllByProperty

        Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByProperty(String key,
                                    Object value)
        Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the given property.

      • findAllByPropertyMatchingRegex

        Iterable<FRAMETYPE> findAllByPropertyMatchingRegex(String key,
                                                 String... regex)
        Find all instances of the WindupVertexFrame type on which this Service operates with the specified property matching the given regexes.

      • getById

        FRAMETYPE getById(Object id)
        Get the instance of the type on which this Service operates that has the given id value.

      • getUnique

        FRAMETYPE getUnique()
                                                             throws NonUniqueResultException
        Get a unique instance of the type on which this Service operates.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException

      • getUniqueByProperty

        FRAMETYPE getUniqueByProperty(String property,
                            Object value)
                                                                       throws NonUniqueResultException
        Search the graph for a model of the appropriate type with the given property name and value. Return null if not found.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException

      • newTransaction

        com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.TitanTransaction newTransaction()
        Begin a transaction.
        See Also:
        commit()

      • getType

        Class<FRAMETYPE> getType()
        Get the WindupVertexFrame type for which this Service operates.
